entry.title: From Start To End
entry.summary:
Author: NeptonicMistakes

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 74,913Chapters: 33/?Kudos: 234

Summary: A lot is story with some smut. If you want to read it and not have smut, chapters with it will be labeled and will have no major change to the story (the chapters of smut will just be smut, no extra things)Like the title, it starts at the beginning of Superman and Batman, before they are known to the public, before the robins. Before Bruce and Clark know one another and time goes on.Idk, this is sort of just a ramble and me getting my fixation to write out. Updates every Monday Night.Might be fanart at times??Lot more other relationships will be established as they come to. But main focus is Bruce and Clark

entry.title: Oooo you wanna kiss me so bad
entry.summary:
Author: iMiss2012fandomVibes

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,005Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 21

Summary: “You’re not healing,” Bruce stressed.Clark finally opened his eyes, abruptly pulling his hands back to grip the edge of the table he was sitting on.“I am. It’s just the kryptonite in my bloodstream. When I get back up into the sun it’ll heal faster. I’m still feeling weak and probably can’t fly yet, though…” he shifted a bit. “But I already feel tons better…thank you.”Bruce didn’t respond. He looked at Clark skeptically before putting his hand over Clark’s, pinning it down to the table.“Push up on my hand.”Sexual tension while stitching up wounds trope. The Kryptonite is a metaphor.

Let’s go home.” or: t4t halbarry porn with the littlest bit of plot :)

entry.title: Gravity Pull
entry.summary:
Author: lostinreeverie

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,276Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 146

Summary: He raised a hand. Placed it gently on Clark’s shoulder, right near the base of his neck. Warm skin under his glove. Just a brief touch. A steady one. And Clark—Clark melted. His breath caught, barely audible, and then he let it out slowly. Like something inside him had come unclenched. His shoulders dropped beneath Bruce’s hand, posture softening almost imperceptibly. He didn’t move away. Didn’t flinch. Bruce went still. Or, Bruce notices Clark might need more than just kindness—and decides to give it to him.

entry.title: Single Dad Saturdays
entry.summary:
Author: Sugarof5oaks

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,912Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 17

Summary: Logan Howlett never thought he would need a partner. OK, maybe need is not the right word. Logan would like a partner; however, when you are a single dad of five kids ranging in age from high school to preschool, your dating pool is very slim. However, that all can change one day when his nosy neighbors, who are best friends, decide to help with his dating life. Not to mention the sexy new neighbor that tolerates Logan's brooding behavior, will Logan find love, or will his temper close off opportunities that prevent him from finding love again?

entry.title: The Weight of Expectations
entry.summary:
Author: mustangisinflames

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,547Chapters: 2/2Kudos: 35

Summary: The hologram of his biological father had initially made him overjoyed. To be able to see one of the parents who'd created him, to talk to him, to, at last, ask questions and have them answered - it had been everything he'd ever wanted since ma and pa had told him how they'd found him as a baby. It should've been a slotting into place, a joining of parts; a filling in of that terrible, aching gap in his chest he'd felt ever since the day his powers started appearing and he knew he was irrevocably different. This secluded haven, this part of Krypton tucked safely away in sheets of ice, snow, and permafrost, should've been a comfort.Instead, it was a burden. Clark struggles with an identity he feels he isn't worthy of.Bruce knows exactly who he must be.

entry.title: First Light
entry.summary:
Author: lighthouse_inkwell

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,207Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 46

Summary: Bruce Wayne is overwhelmed.In trying to get initiatives off the ground that will actually improve Gotham's infrastructure, he unwillingly goes on a press tour in Metropolis, where he is met with increasingly personal questions about his reappearance into society, and of course (as always) his parents tragic deaths. Panic attacks ensue, Bruce meets a particularly polite reporter who talks him out of it, but is met with a brand new problem when a miscommunication leads the public into thinking Bruce is dating said reporter.Clark convinces Bruce that answering questions about a fake relationship would be leagues easier than answering questions about dead parents. Bruce agrees. And totally not because Clark has the most charming smiling he's ever seen.

entry.title: The Buttered Cat Paradox
entry.summary:
Author: writersagainstwritersblock

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 27,026Chapters: 12/?Kudos: 381

Summary: “No comment.”“You don’t know what I was going to ask,” Clark said with a hint of a smile. “Maybe I just wanted to congratulate you on catching the Film Freak.”Bruce gave him a flat look.“Or maybe I think I can help.”“With a case of vandalism?”Clark stepped in front of him. “It’s not vandalism and you know it, detective.”“And what makes you say that?”“If it were vandalism it would be something a lot more juvenile. To the point. It wouldn’t claim there were seventeen missing kids. That’s public outcry.”“Is that so?”“That and I tried to do a story on the growing number of homeless children last month and I got shut down. According to the last count, the numbers have been decreasing, but there’s been no change in policies, no extra funding to CPS, or shelters, or even an increase in the number of inmates in the juvenile detention center. So where are they going?” Detective Bruce Wayne may have the highest solve rate in Gotham, but if he wants to solve this case, he’ll need the help of an elusive street kid, and while Dick Grayson always lands on his feet, he usually lands himself right into trouble.

entry.title: As Though the Sun Will Never Set
entry.summary:
Author: Scarlet609

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,864Chapters: 1/65Kudos: 24

Summary: Bruce Wayne has done something to get him sent to live with the Kents, he thought it would be mundane and unfulfilling, but he soon finds himself caught between something dangerous and wonderful. There are factions moving in to claim his prize, his newly found trump card and he's not ready to let it go.Enter Clark, the soft-spoken Kansas farm boy, just a little too wholesome, a little too comfortable with cows and crickets and just a little too strong for his own good.As Bruce enters the plotters and begins weaving his web of seduction and treachery, mundanity seems further and further away, slipping through Clark's fingers.

entry.title: Why doesn’t he want me, man?
entry.summary:
Author: BeelzebubsBois

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,554Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 84

Summary: After another fight between the dark knight and his son, during a particularly stressful night of patrol, Damian runs away to Dick’s house to ask for help. Long term help.Damian, Dick, and Wally learn to navigate life as a family with the help of Wally’s dads, Dick’s siblings, and a lot of trial and even more errors.But they never give up on the life they know they can build for themselves.
